page.title: 19HOBBIES OF DEFYNNOG PUPILS
page.content:
Pupils from class 3 questioned their peers about their hobbies & interests. The pupils attend Defynnog school but only 45.2% live within our survey area . Riding mini-motorbikes...........25.8% Reading..........................12.9% Collecting stamps................ 9.7% Horse riding..................... 9.7% Playing the piano................ 6.5% Fishing.......................... 6.5% Helping on the farm.............. 6.5% B.M.X. stunt riding.............. 3.2% Ice skating...................... 3.2% Hill walking (rambling).......... 3.2% Dinosaurs (reading about)........ 3.2% Watching television.............. 3.2% Playing football/rugby........... 3.2% Swimming......................... 3.2%
Pupils were boys and girls between the ages 5 and 11 years.
